title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Chat with local models in a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models. Plug local LLMs into chains, agents and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama. Upload docs, images, RAG, multi-user.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama. Simple fluent API with streaming and custom options.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama. Chat, generate, embed with local models in Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust CLI wrapper around Ollama REST API. Fast binary with shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama. Use local LLMs in production-grade RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, vision, RAG, fine-tuning, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama deployments with CUDA and ROCm variants.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama in CI pipelines. Test prompts against local models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain. One-click Docker setup.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to chat with local Ollama models inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot starter that autoconfigures Ollama REST client beans for Java apps.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into any channel or thread.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama. Idiomatic API with context cancellation and streaming.

title: ollama-operator
summary: Kubernetes operator managing Ollama instances and model caches as custom resources.
